title: "Watch what happens when AI teaches a robot ‘hand’ to twirl a pen"
excerpt: "A team at NVIDIA Research directed an AI protocol powered by OpenAI’s GPT-4 to teach a simulation of a robotic hand nearly 30 complex tasks, including tossing a ball, pushing blocks, pressing switches, and some seriously impressive pen-twirling abilities."
